system.requirements:
.Ogryn Comrade, Strength 35,
Apt: Ballistic Skill, Offence
system.descriptionText: Until the end of the Turn, Comrade in Cohesion forces enemies to re-roll successful Dodge Tests made to avoid Character's Attacks.

description.value: Until the end of the Turn, Comrade in Cohesion forces enemies to re-roll successful Dodge Tests made to avoid Character's Attacks.
